title: SABIC reaffirms commitment to processing 1M tons of circular materials annually by 2030 - BIC Magazine
summary: SABIC reaffirms commitment to processing 1M tons of circular materials annually by 2030 through its TRUCIRCLE solutions to advance the circular economy and sustainability.
green_innovation: TRUE. This is green innovation as SABIC is committing to processing circular materials and promoting sustainability goals.
business_innovation: TRUE. Processing one million metric tons of TRUCIRCLE solutions by 2030 showcases a significant business innovation in the chemicals industry.
green_product: TRUE. SABIC's TRUCIRCLE solutions, including certified circular and bio-based products, aim to reduce environmental impact and promote sustainability.
green_process: TRUE. SABIC's initiatives to use advanced recycling and bio-based materials demonstrate a green process that minimizes environmental impacts.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 325110 - Petrochemical Manufacturing, 325120 - Industrial Gas Manufacturing, 326150 - Urethane and Other Foam Product Manufacturing, 562111 - Solid Waste Collection
greenwashing: FALSE. The article does not contain false or misleading information about the environmental benefits of SABIC's TRUCIRCLE solutions; hence, it is not an example of greenwashing.
